data.message: a person is pretending to be my girlfriend on another account and is harrassing us, we reported the fake profile many times but facebook says it does not go against community standards. this is getting annoying now since the person is starting to post explicit photos that facebook does nothing about either, the account recently messaged me claiming to be her ex. how about you actually fix the report button so fake accounts can be dealed with!

replies.message: Hey Kyle. Fake profiles created to imitate real people (impostor accounts) aren't allowed on Facebook. If someone created an account pretending to be someone you know, please report it by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2v6J1Bc. -Ashley
ive reported the account myself and my girfliend reported it. but facebook has said nothing is wrong with the account
Facebook you guys suck at maintaining facebook because you cant handle a simple issue
Thank you for helping bout that baby Kyle Border
